original_text: As your words came to me, I took them into me like sweet food. I belong to you, Lord, God Almighty, so your words made me very happy. As your words came to me, I took them into me like sweet food. I belong to you, Lord, God Almighty, so your words made me very happy. As your words came to me,
korean_text: 만군의 하나님 여호와시여 나는 주의 이름으로 일컬음을 받는 자라 내가 주의 말씀을 얻어 먹었사오니 주의 말씀은 내게 기쁨과 내 마음의 즐거움이오나

sentences.original_text: As your words came to me
I took them into me like sweet food
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것들을 단 음식처럼 마음에 받았습니다

sentences.original_text: so your words made me very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 주님의 말씀이 나를 매우 기쁘게 했습니다
